description: A brand new take on the world famous word guessing game.

0.7.1.description:
## What is this game?

Everyone knows the word guessing game that was bought by the NY Times.
This is a Wordle randomiser built from the ground up to work with Archipelago.

You start with a limited number of letters (just a single letter by default), a reduced number of guesses, missing features such as show misplaced letters as yellow, and greying out wrong letters.
This means that guesses have to be possible with just a single letter, and so the normal limitation of guesses having to be a real word has been removed.
If you use all your guesses without getting the word, you have to wait for a cooldown before you can get a new word to guess.

The goal is to guess a certain number of words with options for even more of a challenge.

Items to unlock in the game are:
- The ability to use the rest of the letters
- showing of yellow letters
- Greying out of wrong letters
- More guesses
- Reduced cooldown time

Locations to find checks are:
- Successfully finding each letter in any word
- The first time you find 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 letters correct in a word
- Guessing each word up to your goal

It's all build in JavaScript so it can run in most modern HTML5-capable browsers.
It's resumable from anywhere, so you can very easily switch machines you're playing on, everything catches up as soon as you connect.

## What is included in this release

This release is the initial work for the wordipelago apworld. fully functional and compatible with the latest deployment to [Wordipelago Game](https://apworlds.com/wordipelago)
0.7.1.title: Wordipelago apworld 0.7.1

0.8.0.description:
### Added
- Positional Checks for both green and yellow letters
  - Options for how green checks work and whether to enable yellow checks
- Option for which letter have checks for being used (None, Vowels, Common, All)
### Improved
- Cooldown synced to server (No more refresh to reset)
- More robust system for determining word feasibility
### Fixed
- Softlock states
- Corrected generation rules for users starting with yellow letters
- Off by one error with item counts
- Rules conditional on locations/items existing

0.8.1.description:
### Added
- Options for new items and Traps (No client use yet)
### Fixed
- Rules now properly get applied for the ability to use letters

0.8.2.description:
### Fixed
- Starting items being distributed to all Wordipelago slots is a game

0.8.3.description:
### Fixed
- Generation should now work with only wordipelago
- Completion condition corrected with new event for final word
- Access logic has been moved to regions for the most part to reduce duplication and overwork

0.8.4r2.description:
### Fixed
- Removed world scoped variables to fix games with multiple wordipelago players

0.8.5.description:
### Fixed
- End game condition correctly resolves

0.8.6.description:
### Changed
- Increased max cooldown to 5 hours
### Fixed
- re-added generate_early checks for restrictive starts

1.0.0r2.description:
# v1.0.0
> ## Client
> > ### Added
> > - Hard Mode
> >    - Challenge yourself by forcing guesses to contain correct letters
> >    - Can be enabled or disabled at will
> > - Restrictive Guesses
> >    - No more letter spam, only dictionary words
> >    - Can be enabled or disabled at will
> > - The ability to skip the current round (Esc)
> > - Point Shop
> >	   - Earn points for every green letter in a guess
> >	   - Point multiplier for playing in hard mode
> >	   - Point multiplier for playing with restricted guesses
> >	   - Bonus point bundles as filler items
> >	   - Purchasable word hints
> >	   - Purchasable checks
> > - In game chat
> >	   - Supports all AP commands
> >    - Log of all items recieved
> > - A slew of new in game options
> >    - Time display, seconds vs minutes & seconds
> >    - Theme, Don't like dark mode? no problem
> >    - Auto Reset, automatically start a new round when the cooldown timer hits 0
> > - Sound effects with independent volume controls
> > - Items gained while offline are shown when rejoining the game
> > - Multi client syncing, play the same slot over multiple devices
> > - Logical checks more obvious in the UI
> > - Suggestion Item now suggests words
> > - Ability to join game directly from a link
> > ### Changed
> > - Brand new interface
> >	   - Tidier view of all checks
> >    - Tabs for suppplimental features
> > - The game will now automatically detect and switch to the version matching the APworld
> > - Letters without checks are automatically marked on the keyboard as green
> > - Home page links now direct you to the lastest github release
> > ### Fixed
> > - Mobile Layout more consistent
> > - Link on landing page now points at github latest release
> ## APWorld
> > ### Added
> > - New Options
> >    - Logic Difficulty
> >    - Word Streaks
> >    - Word Weighting
> >    - Point Shop
> >    - Extra Guesses
> >    - Typing Shuffle
> > - Option Groups
> > ### Changed
> > - Fully fleshed out traps
> > - Renamed Time item to be more descriptive
> > - Adjusted option names
> > - Fleshed out documentation, both for the game and options
> > ### Fixed
> > - Spelling mistakes in options

1.0.2.description: Updated Wordipelago, Adjusting options to allow for more consistent generation
